intro: Elatostema neriifolium, commonly known as the black-leafed elatostema, is a species of flowering plant in the family Melastomataceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its small, ovate leaves that are often dark green in color. The plant produces clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers that bloom throughout the growing season. Elatostema neriifolium typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for study in tropical botany and ecological research.
